title: Pakistan to fast-track AI policy by bringing in international experts
description: ISLAMABAD: Pakistan is embarking on a strategic overhaul of its artificial intelligence roadmap, as the federal government moves to induct international AI specialists into the proposed National AI Council.

title: Asian markets extend global retreat as tech worries build
description: Asian equities sank again on Friday as a tech rout that battered Wall Street for the third day in a row showed no sign of letting up amid growing unease about the hundreds of billions splashed out on artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Big Tech’s $600 billion spending plans exacerbate investors’ AI headache
description: Big tech firms, including Amazon and Alphabet, are set to invest $600 billion in artificial intelligence by 2026. This has caused concern among investors about profitability and its impact on software companies. While some companies saw gains, data analytics firms faced selling pressure and the S&P 500 software and services index dropped 8% this week.

title: Chatbot Chucky: Parents told to keep kids away from talking AI dolls
description: Artificial intelligence-based toys say inappropriate things to children and breach a home's privacy through extensive data collection, according to Common Sense Media, a US-based electronic consumer goods watchdog.
content:
BERLIN: From the picaresque adventures of Toy Story to the laddish couch-potato antics of Ted, dolls and stuffed bears coming to life is a worn-out cinema trope.
